DOC.brief_summary: Testing safety and tolerability of transcranial direct current stimulation (2 mA, 20 minutes) in four different protocols: saline-soaked sponges electrode with electrode gel tap-water-soaked sponges tap-water-soaked-sponges + sham stimulation Outcome measures are tolerability (comfort rating questionnaire), impedances, skin elasticity
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation (tDCS)
DOC.criteria: no neurological or psychiatric illness written informed consent dermatologic diseases medication with corticoids
